summary: Northrop Grumman is a huge American company that makes planes, satellites, and weapons for the military. It's one of the biggest companies in the world that does this. They have lots of smart engineers who've built things like the James Webb Space Telescope, which helps us explore space. Northrop Grumman is also working on a new bomber plane called the B-21 Raider, which can fly far and hide from radar. They're involved in many important projects, including helping NASA send rockets into space.
title: Northrop Grumman
